Text.Language: Pisorp qen nia~poctoloc: eumou] e~rof je Cimwn Petroc: n~yof on pe e~tautenhoutf: e~nisost n~te y~metouro n~niv/oui.
The first among the Apostles, who is called Simon Peter, he was entrusted with the keys, of the kingdom of heaven.
